Detailed Description

This module contains the API related to the overlay comparison function.

See also
OverlayComparisonService.compareImageData The critical API.
Since
9.0.0

◆ BlendColorResolver

type BlendColorResolver = (options: BlendColorResolverOptions) => number|Color

Callback function for calculating pixel point blending colors.

Parameters
optionsBlendColorResolverOptions -
Returns
number|Color - The calculated color, either as an ARGB number, or as a Color instance.
